headline: A Look At Southern (SO) Valuation After Winter Storm Fern Highlights Grid Resilience
summary: Storm response puts Southern in focus Southern (SO) is back on investor radars after its Georgia Power unit restored power to nearly all customers affected by Winter Storm Fern, highlighting grid resilience and preparedness for higher electricity demand in severe cold. See our latest analysis for Southern. Despite the positive attention from its storm response, Southern’s share price has been relatively steady, with a 1.1% year to date share price return and a 5.3% total shareholder return...
